role.argrole: thing examined or studied - usually marked by على

example.parse: S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اثنى) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM مجلس) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الامن) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM الفرعي))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC خلال) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اجتماع) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الدوري)))) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الاجراءات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الامنية)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS اتخذت) (NP-OBJ (NP (PVSUFF_DO:3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM المديرية) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM العامة)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN قوى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الامن) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الداخلي))))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN اطلاع) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN وزير) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الداخلية))) (PP-CLR (PREP علي) (NP (PRON_3FS ها)))))) (PUNC ,)
